featured.text: All we hear is the scratching of pencil on paper, the sound of pigeons, and the delivery of inter-office correspondence by paper airplane. Wonderful!

definition.zh_def: 交付，運送，特別是指將貨物或服務送到指定地點的行為。
definition.en_def: The act of bringing goods or services to a specific location.
definition.example: The delivery of the package was scheduled for tomorrow.
